law.catch_line: Suspension of fire boss -- Revocation of certificate.
law.text: Any fire boss who fails to perform his duties, or who makes a false report of the condition of any place in the portion of the mine allotted to him for examination, shall be suspended by the mine foreman, and his name shall be given to the mine inspector for prosecution. If he is found guilty by the board, he shall return his certificate of qualification to the department.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 22, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 29. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739-38.
